verbLexeme: 1. To do something that is pleasant to do but not very important, especially something around the house. English = potter, potter about, mess about.
2. To do something in a very disorganised or casual way without really achieving very much but, nonetheless, enjoying yourself. British English = faff, faff about
nominalLexeme: 1. The act of doing something that is very pleasant to do but not very important, especially something around the house. English = pottering.
